Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product that has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. I am offering this unique opportunity to acquire it for a special introductory price of $15000. This exceptional offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to quality. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our premium product. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
